cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Financial Services on November 16, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5910, Holding SPACs Accountable Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 196 (Tuesday, November 9, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SAN NICOLAS:
H.R. 5910.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H6242]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 27 - 23.

sponsors.fullName: Del. San Nicolas, Michael F. Q. [D-GU-At Large]
